title: Can't launch LoL at all. (Laptop)
body:
So the day patch 6.3 came out my Laptop wouldn't even think of launching LoL at all I can't get to the launch screen nor login screen or the client itself. I think it might be my laptop or something that patch 6.3 has added that isn't letting my laptop even think of starting League.
I tried the following and none of them worked:
- Factory resetting my laptop.
- Starting league in administrator. (sometimes it works but didn't this time ;( )
I was going to uninstall League but with my bad internet it will prob take a week and a half to reinstall it so trying to make that a last resort. So if any riot members have any advise I would desperately like help, if I don't get a response within the next couple days I will just try to uninstall it then reinstall it.

P.S. League does work on my PC though but dads 24/7 on it so I get it once in a blue moon.

replies.body: just wanna ask how you "factory reset" a laptop O_O??
Well my friend said he did it so that's probably why my laptop is being really shit lately. (it might not be patch 6.3 or whatever it is)

what spec is ur laptop? 
coz i got an old toshiba running win10 and i had no problem what so ever
perhaps something when wrong during the installing process?

i am not sure, but since you already have the game installed
try downloading the installer again and reinstall see what happens
Do you have avast on your laptop as that has been a problem for many people. Avast thinking league is a virus...
i have avast and it never gave me any problem O .O
No, I don't have avast on my laptop.
